entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
